text: Great soundtrack, but if listened on a good pair of headphones or 50€ IEM's you can hear some weird noise from the guitar. That typical noise when sliding your hands on the strings.
author: Rivalo

text:
I don't always view that noise as a bad thing. For example, I think it improves Bastion's soundtrack to have that sliding sound present, especially on tracks like Build That Wall. 

Now for music that isn't going for a certain aesthetic, like the future-folk of Bastion, it would be undesirable and distracting.

author: fasterthings

text:
Best. Soundtrack. Ever!
Full of beats, strange instruments, and it really gets my blood pumping.
The game itself is one of my favorites too, like Breakout but on Hallucinogens and Speed!
But about the soundtrack again: No wonder it's purchasable as a CD, really!
